our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.description: Blue Skies Above is a flight school born out of the mind of Chief Flight Instructor and Founder Matthew Bourguignon. Named after a catchphrase used in the past by his own flight instructor, Matthew chose to continue the tradition in his flight school. "Blue Skies" was a phrase used at the end of almost any conversation or call during his flight instruction and reminds Matthew of his former CFI, the biggest influence in Matthew's attraction to aviation.

leadership_team.title: Leadership Team
leadership_team.description: Our leadership team is comprised of experienced aviation professionals who are passionate about aviation and committed to providing the highest level of training and support to our students.

members.name: Matthew Bourguignon
members.title: CFII | Founder
members.description: Matthew is an aviation enthusiast driven by a childhood dream inspired by his model airplane-flying grandfather from Long Island. Despite initially aiming for aviation college, concerns about student debt led him to the tech industry after graduating in 2011. The 2020 pandemic reignited Matthew's passion for flight, and he embarked on training to become a commercial pilot, discovering a deep love for general aviation. Now as a Certified Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII), Matthew finds great satisfaction in helping others succeed. In February 2023, he founded Blue Skies Above, quickly growing with a dedicated team to fulfill his dream of growing a community of pilots.

members.name: Kate Roberts
members.title: Operations Supervisor
members.description: Kate is a Knoxville Tennessee Native who grew up passionate about aviation. Kate's father was a navigator on KC-135s, which sparked her interest in flying. She is planning to graduate from Auburn University with a degree in Aviation Management in December 2024. Kate is currently an instrument rated private pilot finishing her commercial at Blue Skies Above. In her free time she enjoys riding motorcycles, being outdoors, and hanging out with her dog "Goose".

members.name: A.J. Dorizas
members.title: Training Coordinator
members.description: A.J. is currently serving as a training coordinator at Blue Skies Above. His journey in aviation began at Auburn University, where he majored in aviation management. Over the past three years, AJ has worked as a firefighter, cultivating his leadership skills and deepening his commitment to serving his community. Additionally, as the founder and president of "Fit for Flight," he inspires fellow aviation students to prioritize their physical health and mental well-being. AJ's dedication to fostering a healthier future for aspiring aviators reflects his desire to make a meaningful impact in the aviation world.

instructors.title: Our Instructors
instructors.description: Our experienced instructors at Blue Skies Above are committed to providing the highest quality flight training to students. With a passion for aviation and extensive knowledge, they create a supportive and safe learning environment for students to achieve their goals and become skilled pilots.

members.name: Joe
members.title:
Lead Instructor
Fixed Wing CFI, CFII, MEI

maintenance_staff.title: Our Maintenance Staff
maintenance_staff.description: Our dedicated maintenance staff at Blue Skies Above are committed to ensuring the highest standards of safety and reliability for our aircraft. With a passion for precision and extensive expertise, they work diligently to maintain and service our fleet, supporting a safe and seamless aviation experience for all.

video_section.title: Blue Skies Above: Your Guide to Starting Your Journey
video_section.description: Your aviation journey begins with a discovery flight in Lanett or Auburn, the first step toward reaching your goals in the skies. Whether you dream of flying for fun or pursuing a professional career, understanding the process is essential. Blue Skies Above will walk you through the different paths available, from local flight training options to certifications, helping you navigate each step with confidence.

cta_section.title: We are the flight training experts in Lanett, AL
cta_section.subtitle: Providing pilot training to the Auburn, Columbus, Opelika, LaGrange, Montgomery areas in Alabama and Georgia
cta_section.description: As the only independent flight school with a Cessna fleet in the area, we pride ourselves in training safe and highly proficient pilots. Come see what everyone's talking about! Visit Blue Skies Above and begin flight training today.
